sub_topic.name: The New Jerusalem and Eternal Glory
sub_topic.description: 13-year academic progression (K-12) for The New Jerusalem and Eternal Glory in Revelation (Bible & Theology)

objectives.objective_text: Compare the Garden of Eden with the Garden City.
